tool_description: Free API to the Kanji alive web application with CC-BY licensed language data on Japanese kanji, radicals and associated media files.
name: Learn to read and write Japanese kanji
title: Learn to read and write Japanese kanji
tool_name: Learn to read and write Japanese kanji

api_list.name: Basic Search
api_list.description: A kanji character, Onyomi reading (katakana), Kunyomi reading (hiragana) or a kanji's simplified English meaning.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: N.B. With Basic Search, Onyomi and Kunyomi values must be in katakana or hiragana.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://kanjialive-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/public/search/rain"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kanjialive-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://kanjialive-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/public/search/{query}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kanjialive-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://kanjialive-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/public/kanji/訪"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kanjialive-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
